entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low 10 with temperature rising to 16 by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low 10 with temperature rising to 16 by morning. Forecast issued 6:51 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Showers or thunderstorms. High 21.

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few showers. Low plus 2.
